body_html: Most cells in core use a merged weight matrix for all gates for performance purposes, making gate specific initialization difficult. If you have an approach that doesn't involve breaking up the weights into 4 smaller tensors, we should consider it for merging.
body_text: Most cells in core use a merged weight matrix for all gates for performance purposes, making gate specific initialization difficult.  If you have an approach that doesn't involve breaking up the weights into 4 smaller tensors, we should consider it for merging.
body: Most cells in core use a merged weight matrix for all gates for performance purposes, making gate specific initialization difficult.  If you have an approach that doesn't involve breaking up the weights into 4 smaller tensors, we should consider it for merging.
